body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "configure
set class-of-service forwarding-classes queue 0 data-queue
set class-of-service classifiers exp {{pf_exp_name}} forwarding-class data-queue loss-priority low code-points 000
set class-of-service classifiers inet-precedence {{pf_inet_precedence_name}} import default
set class-of-service schedulers sched
set class-of-service forwarding-classes queue 1 scheduler-class
set class-of-service scheduler-maps {{pf_sched_map_name}} forwarding-class scheduler-class scheduler sched
commit
exit"
  }
}
